title: Ticket #6288: Allow PRE/POST scripts on splices
description:
I thought there was already a ticket for this, but it doesn't seem like there is (maybe I was thinking of #3587: Add "socket" nodes for splices). Anyhow, it makes sense to have separate tickets for this, because as per discussion a few days ago, Miron wants to release a version of DAGMan that has the socket nodes, and let that get run in the real world for a while before adding any new user-visible functionality.

We definitely need to implement #3587 before we can do this...
creator: wenger
